main event: On 17 July 1957, a bright, shiny, silvery object was observed trailing orange flames as it flew through the sky.
interesting points: The object was seen using ground and air visual observations.,The sighting was reported by both military and civilian sources.,The weather conditions during the sighting were clear.,The object was identified as a meteor after evaluation.,The flight path was described as below the cloud layer, moving east to west.
sighted object: a bright shiny silvery object trailing orange flames
